q: a big loss. "American Idol" returns Wednesday with new judges Steven Tyler and Jennifer Lopez and without the acidic Simon Cowell to keep everyone honest. Jennifer Lopez admits their act will be unlike Simon Cowell 's. We bring a different perspective, I think, than any of the other previous judges really have before, especially if you're speaking about Simon Cowell specifically. We just do, she says. "We hated the whole frenzy of the push for homeownership, and then watching low-income people being raped of equity," says Brenda Torpy, CEO of the Champlain Housing Trust. Poor people never get rich in the real-estate market. If prices go up, you can't afford to buy a home. But if prices go down, you lose tremendous value. Torpy has been with the Burlington shared-equity project from the beginning. Initially, Mayor Sen. Bernie Sanders rejected the idea because he objected on principle to treating low-income people differently than everyone else. But at the time Burlington

said the company would develop a new type of minivan by 2014. Chrysler, which popularized minivans in 1983 under former CEO Lee Iacocca , will "rethink" the minivan to make it more versatile, Sergio Marchionne said. We're not going to give one inch of territory in terms of our domination of( the minivan) segment, Sergio Marchionne told workers at the Windsor Assembly Plant, where the Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town& Country minivans are made. A fresh architecture for a new generation of minivans will be introduced in 2013 or 2014,

Eric Schmidt said on his blogpost that Page, the son of a Michigan State University computer science professor, will now lead product development and technology strategy, areas that are "his greatest strengths." It will be interesting to see what he'll do that's different, what he could not have done in his prior role, said BGC Partners analyst Colin Gillis.

names of stars such as Rihanna and Katy Perry are being thrown into the mix in an attempt to compete with TV giant, American Idol. A friend of Cheryl Cole 's boyfriend, Derek Hough revealed: Everyone thinks Cheryl Cole has the judging job on US X Factor in the bag. "The truth is, nothing has been signed and the producers still aren't convinced. "They are more keen to get a big US star like Katy Perry or Rihanna on the panel- someone who will bring credibility to the show and who is already popular in the US. Interviews with Robin Williams , Bill Clinton , David Letterman , Regis Philbin and Charlie Rose reveal very different men and their paths to near total heart disease and recovery. The side effects are often as emotionally draining as physically debilitating. I would find myself busting into tears and sobbing uncontrollably, recalls David Letterman , a man not given to discussing his emotions in public.
